00038 // #include the details first
00039 #include <thrust/iterator/detail/counting_iterator.inl>

00041 namespace thrust
00042 {
00043 
00127 template<typename Incrementable,
00128          typename System = use_default,
00129          typename Traversal = use_default,
00130          typename Difference = use_default>
00131   class counting_iterator
00132     : public detail::counting_iterator_base<Incrementable, System, Traversal, Difference>::type
00133 {
00136     typedef typename detail::counting_iterator_base<Incrementable, System, Traversal, Difference>::type super_t;
00137 
00138     friend class thrust::experimental::iterator_core_access;
00139 
00140   public:
00141     typedef typename super_t::reference       reference;
00142     typedef typename super_t::difference_type difference_type;
00143 
00150     __host__ __device__
00151     counting_iterator(void){};
00152 
00158     __host__ __device__
00159     counting_iterator(counting_iterator const &rhs):super_t(rhs.base()){}
00160 
00166     template<typename OtherSystem>
00167     __host__ __device__
00168     counting_iterator(counting_iterator<Incrementable, OtherSystem, Traversal, Difference> const &rhs,
00169                       typename thrust::detail::enable_if_convertible<
00170                         typename thrust::iterator_system<counting_iterator<Incrementable,OtherSystem,Traversal,Difference> >::type,
00171                         typename thrust::iterator_system<super_t>::type
00172                       >::type * = 0)
00173       : super_t(rhs.base()){}
00174 
00181     __host__ __device__
00182     explicit counting_iterator(Incrementable x):super_t(x){}
00183 
00186   private:
00187     __host__ __device__
00188     reference dereference(void) const
00189     {
00190       return this->base_reference();
00191     }
00192 
00193     template <class OtherIncrementable>
00194     __host__ __device__
00195     difference_type
00196     distance_to(counting_iterator<OtherIncrementable, System, Traversal, Difference> const& y) const
00197     {
00198       typedef typename
00199       thrust::detail::eval_if<
00200         thrust::detail::is_numeric<Incrementable>::value,
00201         thrust::detail::identity_<thrust::detail::number_distance<difference_type, Incrementable, OtherIncrementable> >,
00202         thrust::detail::identity_<thrust::detail::iterator_distance<difference_type, Incrementable, OtherIncrementable> >
00203       >::type d;
00204 
00205       return d::distance(this->base(), y.base());
00206     }
00207 
00210 }; // end counting_iterator
00211 
00212 
00219 template <typename Incrementable>
00220 inline __host__ __device__
00221 counting_iterator<Incrementable> make_counting_iterator(Incrementable x)
00222 {
00223   return counting_iterator<Incrementable>(x);
00224 }
